name: SF311
description: SF311 is the primary customer service center for the City of San Francisco. They are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week via phone, web, mobile, and X. If you are calling from outside of San Francisco, please dial 1-415-701-2311 Note: SF311 may also be added as an app to any smartphone, to easily report issues or contact customer service
